name: Donuts cake mania: diet cake! - Play the best donuts cake games for free with extreme donuts catching!
name_original: Donuts cake mania: diet cake! - Play the best donuts cake games for free with extreme donuts catching!
description:
Donuts cake mania: diet cake - the latest free donuts catching game!

This mini casual donuts game is a fun casual games for kids and adults that have a sweet tooth! The goal is simple, catch as many cake as possible within the time limit. If you're looking for a free cooking game for kids, you will be served with this new donuts game! Filled with donuts like : Classic Chocolate, Blue Raspberry and Crazy Cherry, Donuts cake mania will make you feel hungry for more cakes! Beware, it's not a cooking game, but a catching game!

Do your kids like to eat donuts and cake? So much that they are willing to pop them? Have a blast in this cake craving game. Diet is not an option! Simple one touch controls makes the game easy enough to play for kids and adults.

How to play:
- You will have to catch all the donuts for the level by touching them
- You have a time limit
- Touch the corresponding donuts
- Fill your cake box with the objective

Features in this cake games:
- Colorful and awesome graphics
- Easy controls, even for kids and toddlers
- Awesome 2d physics
- Support HD tablets and Phones


Download and play Donuts cake mania: diet cake! now, the best free cake donuts game available !!
